name: The Cursed Gun
description:
You're a weird creature... and you've decide to pick up the gun from the entrace of the dungeon... but you didn't realize that the gun is CURSED.

This is my first game jam game i've ever made, so don't expect much, since it's only 8 levels.

Controls:

  • W & A key to move
  • Space to Jump
  • Use the mouse to shoot.
  • ESC to Pause the game.

Anyway, i hope you enjoy the game!
